shri lankawe kalaguna widya departhamenthuwe thakshanika hakiyawa saha dharithawa shakthimath kirimehi la memangin labena dayakathwaya salakillata gena, ema upa kalapiya kendraya shri lankawe pihituwima sandaha kalaguna widya departhamenthu parishraye demahal godanangillak idi kirima pinisa aapada kalamanakarana amathya anura priyadarshana yapa mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi. 2017/18 maha kannaya sandaha rajaye wi mila di ganime wadasatahana kriyathmaka kirima rajaya wisin pasugiya kalayedi kriyathmaka karana lada wi mila di ganime wadasatahan samalochanaya kirimen saha disthrik lekamwarun athulu adala anekuth niladharin samanga me pilibandawa mathakadi pawathwana lada raswimedi idiripath wi athi karunu salakillata ganimin, rajaye wi mila di ganime wadasatahana mema maha kannayedi wadath paladayiwa kriyathmaka kirimata awadhanaya yomu wi atha.

kadugannawe balana ha ihalakotte athara athi dumriya margaye binge asalata wishala kalugalak peralimen udarata dumriya margaye dumriya gamanagamanaya eeye (22) sawasa 4.30 sita anahita atha.mahanuwarin sawasa 3.00ta kolambaa bala pitath wu nagaranthara shighragami dumriya da kadugannawa dakwa pamanak dhawanaya kara athi bawa dumriya departhamenthuwe ihala niladhariyek dinaminata pawasiya.me hethuwen udarata dumriya margaye dhawanaya wana dumriya kolambaa sita rambaukkana dakwath, nuwara sita kadugannawa dakwath pamanak dhawanaya kirimata siduwi atha.mema wishala kalugala wedi dama iwath kirimata awashya sewakayin siddhiya wi sulu mohothakin ema sthanayata pamina awashya katayuthu kala athara ada (23) wanawita gala iwathkara dumriya dhawanaya yatha thaththwayata pathkirimata piyawara ganna bawada ema usas niladhariya dinaminata pawasiya..

ema kriyadamaya arambaimata, nithi wirodhi nadu asa thama padawiyen iwathkala agrawinishchayakarawariya wana shirani bandaranayaka wahama kriyathmaka wana paridi nawatha ema padawiyehi pihituwima, pasugiya wakawanuwe polis athadanguwedi miyagiya aya saha athadanguwata ganimen pasu aayudha penwimata gos manchu pitin diye panna sakakaruwan, manchu damu athwalin bomba saha gini awi harambaayata gos miyagiya sakakaruwan (owun kumana aakaraye aparadhayakata sakayata bhajanaya wu sakakaruwan wuwa wuwath), ge marana pilibanda winiwidhabhayakin yuthu parikshana arambaa ema mini marumwalata waradakari polis niladharin (owun wachanaye parisamaptha arthayenma saparadhi minimaruwanya) wahama kriyathmaka wana paridi adhikarana wetha idiripath kirima, rajya depala kadawada gena balaya ayuthu lesa pawichchi karamin thama pudgalika labha prayojanaya sandaha wiwidha dushanayanhi yeduna deshapalagnyayan saha rajya niladharayan gana paryeshana pawathwa owun wahama adhikaranaya idiriyata gena eema, yuddhayen athadanguwata gena adhikarana chodana nomathiwa randawa gena sitina yudha sirakaruwan wahama adhikaranaya idiriyata pamunuwa adhikarana kriyamarga ganima, mewa wahama aarambha kala yuthu kriyadamayan atharin samaharaki.

sulu jathin sandaha wenama wu ayithiwasikam waganthiyak wyawasthawata athulath kirima gana dhanathmaka drushtikonayakin balimata boho wiyathun uthsaha gaththa da, awasana washayen emangin sidu wune janawargika-kendriya deshapalanaya poshanaya kirima sandaha karunu karana mathu karaganimaki. 1956 di gena aa ''sinhala pamanayi panatha'' janawargika wignyanaya poshanaya kirima sandaha thawa thawath rukul dunneya. 1957 di janawargika-kendriya deshapalanaya wiwrutha saha pathirunu swabhawayakin mathu pitata ennata patan gaththeya.
